alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range; Santa Barbara County Mountains; Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 24 at 6:35PM PST until December 26 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches possible above 5000 feet, with lighter accumulations down to 3500 to 4000 feet by late Saturday night or early Sunday morning. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph causing reduced visibilities in blowing snow. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Mountains, Ventura County Mountains and Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult in the mountains with significant delays and possible road closures. Snow will likely lower to pass level Saturday night through Sunday morning, with a couple inches of snow accumulation possible along Interstate 5 near the Grapevine.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow, sleet or ice accumulations that could greatly impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range; Santa Barbara County Mountains; Ventura County Mountains
